column1: Tulkastor was the father of Vairë
column4: the keeper of the Cottage of Lost Play.
column5: p. 16 The Gnomish form of his name was Tulchathron.

column1: Originally the name of the character was Turenbor
column2: later changed to Tulkassë and finally to Tulkastor.
